title: Ternary tin-doped titanium dioxide/calcium oxide (Sn-TiO2/CaO) composite as a photocatalyst for efficient removal of toxic dyes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19984-19995
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03641G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nastaran Parsafard, Rokhsareh Abedi, Homa Moodi
The present study has shown that eggshells are important as a raw material for the successful synthesis of CaO. The synthesized sample was analyzed for the photodegradation of AR, BPB, MB, MG, and MR dyes using UV light.
